message:
I've just been looking into co-working. There's a good summary at http://www.coworkingtoronto.ca/

I was wondering if there's any online chat rooms or solutions for "virtual" co-working.

Tele-commuting and virtual meeting spaces are now common for people in the same company or team, but co-working is for individuals or individual "teams" to come together.

The closest thing I can think of is #chat channels on irc, yet most of these are more Q & A oriented than let's do work and hang out together while doing it.

Do such solutions exist?

Thanks!

( I also posted this on Quora at http://www.quora.com/Coworking/Do-solutions-exist-for-Virtual-Co-working )
